[color=cyan][font=\"century gothic\" size=3]Def. (1) A sacred or holy place. (2) A place of refuge and safety. [/font][/color]

[font=\"century gothic\" size=4]We all seek Sanctuary in one form or another. A place away from prying eyes. A place of peace to pursue individual interests, gather strength, and plan for the future. Surrounded by a savage, unforgiving wilderness of epic beauty and remorseless danger, such a place exhists.

Dragonborn... welcome home.[/center]

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/37995-1323811762.jpg[/img]
Overview description here.
[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/37995-1323811893.jpg[/img]

(1) [color=yellow]Comprehensive Library[/color] - A library to rival Winterhold. Room to store, display, and read the vast number of books collectable throughout Tamriel. Sorting and storage of books is automated.

(2) [color=yellow]Fireplaces and Torches[/color] - Fireplaces require firewood to function. Open the ashes in the fireplace to get started. Adding firewood to the ash pile will cause the ash pile to disappear and be replaced with firewood. Clicking the firewood will then give you the option of lighting the fire. Each unit of firewood added to the ash pile will allow the fire to burn for 2 hours. When the fire burns out, the ash pile returns. Torches burn out and need to be replaced daily.

(3) Blacksmith\'s workshop - Upgradeable with work bench, grind stone, tanning rack and smelter. Complete with shelves and ore bins for the storage of your crafting materials.

(4) Wizard\'s Workshop - Alchemy Lab and Enchanting table. Automated Storage of ingrediants and soul gems.

(5) Kitchen and Pantry - Cooking area and automated storage for all food items.[/font]

[center][img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/imageshare/images/37995-1323806311.jpg[/img][/center]
